  • Methodendetails

    • addMenuBorder

      public void addMenuBorder()
      The addMenuBorder function adds the border to the menu. It does this by setting all the items in slots 0-9, 17, 18, 26-36 and 44-53 to a filler item. It also sets all the items in slots 48, 49, 50 and 51 to their respective border items (Left arrow for slot 48 etc.)

    • setMenuItems
